com.alexdiru.redleaf

Class DataSong

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexdiru.redleaf.DataSong
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisposable

    public class DataSong
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisposable
    Represents a song the player can play As such it stores all the notes which will fall down the screen (and provide methods to update and render these notes)
    Author:
    Alex

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataSong.DataSongDifficulty
      Represents the levels of difficulty of the song

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        private void parse(java.lang.String filePath,
         int currentDifficulty)
        Parse a data file to extract the song data of the specified difficulty
        Parameters:
        filePath - The file path of the *.rl file
        currentDifficulty - The difficulty level to extract the notes of

      • updateNotes

        public void updateNotes(int currentTime,
               int renderDistance)
        Determines which notes are to be rendered
        Parameters:
        currentTime - The current time of the song being played
        renderDistance - How many milliseconds to look forward in the song to select notes

      • renderNotes

        public void renderNotes(Canvas canvas,
               int currentTime)
        Renders the notes of the song
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to render to
        songSpeed - The speed of the song

      • getNextTappableNoteInPosition

        private DataNote getNextTappableNoteInPosition(int position)
        Given a position, this will return the next note which will be tappable in that position
        Parameters:
        position - The tapbox position
        Returns:
        The note, or null if no notes found

      • tap

        public void tap(int position,
       int currentTime)
        Called when the player makes a tap on a tapbox, handles all the tapping of the notes
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the tapbox which the player tapped
        currentTime - The current time of the song

      • unhold

        public void unhold(int position)
        Called when the player lifts a finger up, makes sure any held notes are unheld
